review: Very fun game, Really enjoy playing it trying to build a base before being inevitably destroyed because my cannons refuse to fire. :)
Fun and simple, It's 1 hour of switching and turning until you finish the game, Very good for the price range, A level editor would be a cool addition too.
It's basically a game that revolves around you taking care of your plants.Also the music is great.
A fun simple game. Play it.
Enjoy this game, I'm terrible at it tho.
A cool minimalist game you can play to kill some time.3 hours of gameplay for me, because I am not particularly good at games like this. ._.
